titleInfo.title: Report on the Brauer-Thrall conjectures: Rojter's theorem and the theorem of Nazarova and Rojter (on algorithms for solving vectorspace problems. I)
Representation Theory I. Proceedings of the Workshop on the Present Trends in Representation Theory, Ottawa, Carleton University, August 13-18, 1979: No. 1

I)”. In Representation Theory I. Proceedings of the Workshop on the Present Trends in Representation Theory, Ottawa, Carleton University, August 13-18, 1979: No. 1, ed.
